From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 film by Dolph Lundgren

Running time85 minutes[1]CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Wanted Man is a 2024 American action film starring and directed by Dolph Lundgren, who also wrote the screenplay with Michael Worth.[2][3][4]
The film was released by Quiver Distribution in select theaters and on video on demand in the United States on January 19, 2024.


Cast[edit]

Dolph Lundgren as Johansen
Christina Villa as Rosa
Kelsey Grammer as Brynner
Michael Paré as Tinelli
Roger Cross as Hernandez
Aaron McPherson as Hilts
Production[edit]
Filming[edit]
Principal photography took place in Las Cruces, New Mexico in May 2022.[5]

Release[edit]
In November 2023, Quiver Distribution acquired North American distribution rights to the film, scheduling it for a simultaneous release in select theatres and on video on demand on January 19, 2024.[6]

Reception[edit]
Critical response[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 9% of 11 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 3.7/10.[7]

^ Lund, Anthony (October 30, 2021). "Dolph Lundgren to Direct and Star in New Action Movie Wanted Man". MovieWeb. Retrieved May 14, 2022.

^ Padilla, Anna (May 5, 2022). "Film starring Kelsey Grammar begins production in Las Cruces". KRQE. Retrieved May 14, 2022.

^ Grobar, Matt (November 29, 2023). "Quiver Acquires Action Thriller Wanted Man Directed By & Starring Dolph Lundgren". Deadline Hollywood. Retrieved November 30, 2023.

^ "Wanted Man". Rotten Tomatoes. Fandango Media. Retrieved March 16, 2024.
